content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: furnace
inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 4, "index": 10}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}]

thought: To craft a furnace I need to place 8 blackstone or cobblestone blocks in the crafting grid. There are 4 cobblestones available, so I will first move them into the crafting grid. The first one will go into slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 10 to slot 1 with quantity 1

inventory=[{"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 1, "index": 1}, {"type": "cobblestone", "quantity": 3, "index": 10}, {"type": "blaze_rod", "quantity": 8, "index": 20}, {"type": "yellow_bed", "quantity": 1, "index": 23}, {"type": "green_shulker_box", "quantity": 1, "index": 25}, {"type": "blackstone", "quantity": 4, "index": 27}, {"type": "brewing_stand", "quantity": 49, "index": 36}]
